name: Melissa & Doug Created by Me! Bead Bouquet, Deluxe Wooden Jewelry Making Kit, 220+ Bright Colored Beads & Cords, DIY Necklace & Bracelet Making Kit, Arts & Crafts Toddler Toys for Kids Ages 4+
short_description: Easy to Use Wooden Jewelry Making Kit for Kids – Includes 220 colorful wooden beads in fun shapes like hearts, flowers, and butterflies, 8 cords, and tray making it an ideal bracelet maker for creative play
Easy Threading and Storage: Large beads are perfect for small hands. This wooden bead set is packed in a handy wooden tray, allowing kids to easily store their beads.
Supports Skill Development – Helps build fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and cognitive growth while kids string bracelet beads and create their own friendship bracelets, necklaces and more
Gift for Kids Ages 4–8 – Ideal choice for creative birthday gifts, holiday gifts or everyday play, for preschoolers and early learners that inspires screen-free imaginative arts and crafts projects

Wholesome Play for 35+ Years: Melissa & Doug inspires kid-powered play with its learning toys for kids, toddler and preschool toys, puzzles, games, building toys & stuffed animals, dolls, & even a doll house
product_description: Product Description This deluxe beading set is a jewelry designer's dream! The Melissa & Doug Bead Bouquet jewelry making set is an easy-to-use arts and crafts kit for designing and stringing necklaces and more. The wooden sorting tray comes stocked with eight multicolored cords that can be cut to any size so kids can make a necklace, bracelet, or anklet. The kids' jewelry making set includes 220 handcrafted wooden beads in the shape of hearts, flowers, and butterflies, with an array of lovely design details. Everything comes in a sturdy, wooden tray making clean up and storage a breeze. Constructed of high-quality, durable wood, it's a perfect stringing, patterning, and designing activity for budding designers. It's also a great way for kids to practice hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, pattern recognition, and creative expression. For more creative fun, combine this with the Melissa and Doug Decorate Your Own Wooden Butterfly, the Deluxe Wooden Standing Art Easel, Paint & Drawing Supplies, for meaningful learning beyond the classroom. For 35+ years, Melissa and Doug has crafted imaginative preschool toys and durable wooden toys built to nurture childhood wonder, with everything from a life-sized grocery store playset to a play kitchen playset and play food to serve plush toys & puppets, to costumes, arts & crafts, and road trip activities for kids. It’s the kind of kid-powered play that builds independence and confidence! From the Manufacturer Wooden hearts, flowers and butterflies are hand-crafted and decorated with an array of amazing details and packed into a handy wooden tray for deluxe jewelry design. Accent beads in a variety of shapes and colors await your young designer's creative touch to be strung in an ever changing array of patterns on the eight color-coordinated cords.

short_description: MAKE MAGICAL, PERSONALIZED ACCESSORIES: Mix & match wooden ABC beads and colorful charms on vibrant cording to make over 10 custom accessories to wear and share! Create beaded friendship bracelets and necklaces that coordinate with every outfit and other jewelry like rings and earrings!

ALL-NATURAL WOODEN BEADS & CHARMS: All of the colorful beads and charms included in this set are eco-friendly and made from 100% wood! Mix & match round beads and whimsical charms kids will love, like a unicorn, rainbow, and magical fairy wand.

PRE-CUT ELASTIC CORDING WITH SHOELACE ENDS: The colorful elastic cording isn’t just pre-cut for your convenience — it has aglets, or shoelace ends, to make beading extra easy! Strengthen fine motor skills with bead kit activities, all while having fun!

FILL IN THE BLANKS & TELL YOUR STORY: Encourage active listening and storytelling with a mini story maker that helps you create magical tales of your own! Jewelry-making toys are great for stimulating the imagination and creativity of girls and boys of any age, from toddlers to big kids.

SET INCLUDES: 80 Natural Wooden Cube Alphabet Beads (10 mm), Mini Story Maker, 6 Natural Wooden Charm Beads (Heart, Flower, Unicorn, Wand, Rainbow, Cloud), 2 Silver & Gold Elastic Cord Skeins with Shoelace End (12 in.), 2 Pink & Purple Elastic Cord Skeins with Shoelace Ends (12 in.), 4 Elastic Cord Skeins in Blue, Teal, Yellow, Orange with Shoelace Ends (12 in.), 50 Colorful Round Wooden Accent Beads (Blue, Green, Grey, Pink, Purple, White, Yellow), 24 Round Wooden Pony Beads (10 mm), Easy-to-Follow Instructions
product_description: Create. Pretend. Play. Become a magical jewelry-maker with the Story Magic Wooden ABC Beads Set! Mix and match 350+ natural wooden beads on pre-cut elastic cording to create whimsical, personalized accessories — use the alphabet beads to spell out your name or a fun phrase, and explore color combinations by adding accent beads and charms to your designs! This set has all the supplies you need to make 10+ custom pieces of jewelry — which will you make first, a bracelet or necklace? Each of the premium, wooden beads has a large center, and the elastic has shoelace ends to make beading easy for little jewelry makers. After creating your wooden accessories to wear and share with friends, create more Story Magic by filling in the blanks on the mini story maker! Beading sets are great for strengthening dexterity, reducing stress and exploring creative expression for any boy or girl from toddler to big kid.... because you're never too old to dream big and have a ball! Give a handmade gift to someone special to show you care — jewelry is even more special when it's made by you! The Story Magic Wooden ABC Beads Set is recommended for imaginative storytellers ages 4 and up.
